summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an individual whose identity is not specified, indicating they are unavailable until August 10, 2009, and directing inquiries about an 'Epstein issue with State Attorney's Office' to their assistant. The document suggests ongoing communication regarding legal or procedural matters involving Jeffrey Epstein and a State Attorney's Office.

events.title: Out-of-office notification regarding Epstein issue
events.description: An individual sends an automated email reply stating they are out of the office and will return on August 10, 2009, referencing an 'Epstein issue with State Attorney's Office'.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 4, 2009, and references an 'Epstein issue with State Attorney's Office', indicating ongoing legal or procedural matters involving Jeffrey Epstein at that time.
The sender is out of the office until August 10, 2009, and directs inquiries to their assistant, whose contact information is provided but the assistant's name is not specified in the text.
The document is an automated email reply, suggesting it was part of a chain of communication regarding the Epstein case with a State Attorney's Office.
